text: to un donon ko dhokhe se rijha liya. phir jab donon ne us vrksh ka svaad liya, to unake lie unake guptaang khul gaye aur ve unapar svarg ke patte chipakaane lage aur unhen unake paalanahaar ne aavaaz deeh kya mainne tumhen is vrksh se nahin roka tha aur tum donon se nahin kaha tha ki shaitaan tumhaara khula shatru hai
